titles.title: To provide assistance for the operation of the Lewis and Clark National Historic Trail Visitor Center in Nebraska City, Nebraska, and for other purposes.
To provide assistance for the operation of the Lewis and Clark National Historic Trail Visitor Center in Nebraska City, Nebraska, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary: This bill reauthorizes through FY2028 funding to assist with the operations of the historic site, visitor center, and interpretive center for the Lewis and Clark National Historic Trail in Nebraska City, Nebraska.
